text: @JonLemire @NicolleDWallace @Morning_Joe Don’t kid yourself! Look for future briefings to include a rollcall for all governors. And of course government aid to fight the #coronavirus will be based off of attendance and allegiance. That’s his plan: to make himself king and have his subjects dance for their dinner!
